Subskills.name: Hostile Intelligence
Subskills.description: Increases vengeful spirits damage based on your intelligence.

Subskills.name: Nimble Spirit
Subskills.description: Increases the movement speed of vengeful spirit.

Subskills.name: Contaminated Spirit
Subskills.description: Vengeful spirit now deals poison damage inflicting poisoned for a portion of its damage. Additionally gains a chance to unleash a poison nova on hit.

Subskills.name: Swift Bolts
Subskills.description: Increases the attack speed of vengeful spirit.

Subskills.name: Forking Bolts
Subskills.description: Attacks by vengeful spirit have a chance to fork creating multiple chain lightnings.

Subskills.name: Critical Wrath
Subskills.description: Attacks always critically strike targets at max health dealing increased damage stunning them.

Subskills.name: Stacking Pain
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Vengeful Poltergeist
Subskills.description: Vengeful spirit now summons bone spirits and tornados in addition to its normal attack.

Subskills.name: Vacuuming Apparation
Subskills.description: Chance on attack to summon a ghastly whirlpool that pulls nearby targets into it.

Subskills.name: Extended Lightning
Subskills.description: Chain lightning from vengeful spirit chains to additional targets.

Subskills.name: Retaliatory Transfusion
Subskills.description: Vengeful spirit gains an aura that drains a portion of common monster max health per second to heal itself.

Subskills.name: Hatred Reinforcements
Subskills.description: You can now summon additional vengeful spirits.

Subskills.name: Sacrificial Offering
Subskills.description: Your vengeful spirit now absorbs the stats of all nearby necromancer summons killing them in the process. You can no longer summon any minion while vengeful spirit is active.
